attributes.action: Nominate Ann Widdecombe as the next speaker of the House of Commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will ensure that the current process of change is managed by a person of the highest integrity and moral determination. Ann is an MP in whom the British public will place trust and confidence. She will ensure that the moral and ethical standards needed are contained within new regulations for managing and monitoring MP's.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament / individual political parties.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
